about_the_game:
Welcome to the exciting world of Forest Fury - a 2D platformer in retro pixel art style.
This is not just a game; it's an amazing journey where you become a powerful little witch on a mission to save the magical forest from terrifying monsters.
As you step across colorful platforms, you will battle the creatures using your magic and cunning!

Each level is filled with wonders and dangers, from magical flowers to sinister shadows lurking behind the trees.
With unique spells, you can create enchantments using ancient rituals.

Game Features:
Unique spells
Diverse levels
Various enemies
Bright graphics and the atmosphere of a magical world.

name: Forest Fury

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6320 (21866) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950 (2 GB) or higher
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Get ready for adventures, gather allies, and uncover the secrets of Forest Fury! Your forest is waiting for you to cleanse it of dark forces and restore its former beauty.
